comment: The <foreignObject> SVG element includes elements from a different XML namespace. In the context of a browser, it is most likely (X)HTML.

attributes.name: width
attributes.comment:
The height of the foreignObject. 
Value type: <length>|<percentage> ; Default value: auto; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: height
attributes.comment:
The width of the foreignObject. 
Value type: <length>|<percentage> ; Default value: auto; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: x
attributes.comment:
The x coordinate of the foreignObject. 
Value type: <length>|<percentage> ; Default value: 0; Animatable: yes

attributes.name: y
attributes.comment:
The y coordinate of the foreignObject. 
Value type: <length>|<percentage> ; Default value: 0; Animatable: yes
